mapper.sql: id, containerId, deviceId, gpsBatVol, refBatVol, backDoorState, oilLevel, cenBoxTemp, lat, lon, jzLat, jzLon, tankHum, railId, railTag, railChangeTime, refSwiState, refRunMode, tailBoxTemp, enviTemp, backWindTemp, chuWindTemp, nowTime, nowLongTime, receiveTime, receiveLongTime, companyId, operationMode, workMode, powerType, vecRunTime, engRunTime, oilTemp, gpsPower,tempSet,coilTemp,chillerType
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ccdata where containerId = #{containerId} ORDER BY nowTime DESC LIMIT 0 ,1

select
from ccdata where deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0 ,1
select * from ccdata where containerId = #{containerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0 ,1

select max(nowLongTime) as nowLongTime,t.deviceId from( select nowLongTime,deviceId,companyId from ccdata group by companyId , deviceId , nowLongTime) t group by companyId,deviceId having companyId = #{companyId}
select max(nowLongTime) as nowLongTime,containerId from ccdata where companyId = #{companyId} and containerId like concat('%',#{containerId},'%') group by containerId

select
from ccdata where containerId = #{containerId} and nowLongTime between #{start} and #{end} order by nowTime desc

select
from ccdata where containerId = #{containerId} and nowLongTime between #{start} and #{end} order by nowTime asc

mapper.select: SELECT containerId ,deviceId , lat , lon , nowTime FROM Ccdata WHERE containerId = #{containerId} ORDER BY receiveTime DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT containerId,chillerType FROM ccdata WHERE containerId = #{containerId} GROUP BY containerId ORDER BY nowTime DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT MAX(nowLongTime) AS nowLongTime,containerId FROM ccdata WHERE containerId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{containerId},'%') GROUP BY containerId

SELECT MAX(nowLongTime)AS nowLongTime,id, containerId, deviceId, chillerType,vecRunTime, engRunTime,nowTime,backWindTemp FROM ccdata WHERE containerId IN (SELECT containerId FROM container WHERE companyId = #{companyId}) GROUP BY containerId
